thread.title: Winona Ryder's Reactions to David Harbour's SAG Awards Speech Are a Must Watch!
thread.title_full: Winona Ryder's Reactions to David Harbour's SAG Awards Speech Are a Must Watch!

author: Just Jared
title: Winona Ryder's Reactions to David Harbour's SAG Awards Speech Are a Must Watch!
text:
David Harbour might have been the focus of the Stranger Things cast’s speech at the 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards , but it was Winona Ryder ‘s reactions to his words that had everyone talking!
The cast of the hit Netflix series won the award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series and David spoke in his speech about the political climate and how great acting can change the world.
Winona stood right to David ‘s side throughout the speech and the expressions on her face during it were amazing. See all of the GIFs below thanks to Giphy!

Click inside to see more GIFs and to watch the acceptance speech…
